title: Rita Ora breaks her silence amid claims of feud with Liam Payne’s ex Cheryl
text:

Rita Ora has broken her social media silence amid claims she was bombarded with texts from Liam Payne’s ex Cheryl over a steamy snog between the pair.

Reports suggested Cheryl blasted Rita for being ‘inappropriate’ with Liam during an appearance on The Tonight Show last January when the pair were still in a relationship.

According to The Sun, the 36-year-old Girls Aloud star was sat at home watching TV with son Bear when she saw Liam and Rita engage in a steamy snog on American TV.

The incident took place during a performance of the pair’s Fifty Shades Freed duet ‘For You’, resulting in them locking lips mid-performance on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon last January.

It is claimed that Rita was left mortified by the accusations, replying to Cheryl that she “would never, ever go there in a million years".

In an effort to silence the rumours, Rita has now turned to Twitter and Instagram in an effort highlight a career milestone instead.

The 28-year-old star wrote: "On this day a year ago, Let You Love Me made me the British female artist with the most top 10 singles.

(Image: Getty)

"So grateful to have had so much support from my fans, team and family to help me make history together I wouldn’t be able to do it without you! So much more to come."

Rita and Liam’s chemistry has been a bone of contention for Cheryl, who was forced to confronted the former One Direction star about their behaviour following the steamy TV appearance last year.

In order to placate Cheryl, it is claimed that Rita and Liam agreed to tone down their on-stage flirting.

However, the hands-off approach did not go amiss as the pair avoided any physical contact during a performance together at the Brit Awards just three weeks later.

Cheryl and Liam broke up five months later but insisted the end of their two-year relationship had nothing to do with Rita.
